comment: I purchased redmi note 7s mobile on 8th june there was a headset jack problem in that I can't able to hear two sides only one side is hearing... About this problem I have make an complaint  and ask them to replace my mobile but there is no proper response from your side... So kindly take an action and replace or rectify my mobile asap

Great phone, Camera is good, finger print good, The color is very good,  ram performance is good, Everything about this phone is good , Mi has a best phone.in box:- Handset, Charging Cable, SIM Ejector Tool, Warranty Card, Manual, Soft Protective Case, Adapter. all good that mentioned in features

Overall phone is very good.....It is Value for Money....Best phone for this range.....Type C charger helps to charge the phone faster.... Fingerprint reader is worth and working faster.....Camera quality is also Very Nice...But Face unlock is slow......and Touch screen is not much smooth

it's very bad experience to me i am very very despondent in u r quality, i am perches a phone before 22 day MI note 7s ,suddenly after 22 day phone was not working, So i am visited my near MI service center regarding issue but that time, He was told me your are  pay some money for repairing  phone issue  & told me phone is not working bcz of water logging in inside the phone , i don't understanding how can the possible without water teaching how can damage the phone
Not so good after long use.I have been writing a review after 8 months of purchase & use

All are good ....value for money is 5 of 5 star ...Fingerprint reader is too good & camera quality is good but not like note 7 pro .Over all rating 5 of 5 star for this mobile ...Good product launch by Xiaomi Mi .

This phone is not properly workoutIn a month this phone is deadWhen my phone is dead I send my phone to AUTHORIZED MI SERVICE CENTERIn some time mi authority is told me that our phone mother board is deadSo I want to my phone in good conditionSo please help meThank you
nice and sexy phone really. only front camera haven't flash light, and hybrid sim, most of type c cable. i don't like type c. over all best phone in this prive
Worst phone.... Camera error which can't be resolved.... Hangs to much
